card.text: Create two tokens that are each copies of target artifact or creature you control.

card.text: Surveil 3, then draw two cards. Flashback {4}{V}{V} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it. Spend only colored mana produced by effects that add mana of any color to pay {V}.)

card.name: Time Stop
card.text: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities, including this spell. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage heals and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Cho'Gath, Hunger of the Void
card.text: Trample If a card an opponent controls would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, instead exile it. If it was exiled from the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Horror creature token. If it was exiled from the stack, you gain 2 life. If it was exiled from anywhere else, put a +1/+1 counter on Cho'Gath.

card.name: Demon of Domination
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Demon of Domination enters or attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. If a permanent card was exiled this way, uncover. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Demon of Domination. (Create a Treasure token or you may put Relic card you own from outside the game into your graveyard.)

card.name: Evangelist of Oblivion
card.text: Mobilize 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature token. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.) Whenever an opponent draws one or more cards except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, create a 1/1 black Horror Pest creature token with mobilize 1.

card.name: Void Abomination
card.text: Flying When Void Abomination enters, draw three cards. At the beginning of your end step, you lose 2 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Death of Divinity
card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Feast of the Prophet
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create a 4/3 black Horror creature token.

card.name: Amumu, Cursed Child
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Players can't gain life. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Amumu deals 3 damage to that player unless they have Amumu deal 1 damage to each non-Yordle creature they control.

card.name: Relentless Sandthresher
card.text: Haste Whenever a Desert you control enters, you may cast Relentless Sandthresher from your graveyard.

card.name: Horned Swarmcaller
card.text: Flying, haste At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you next exile a card with Horned Swarmcaller. If that card's mana value is equal to or less than the number of creatures that entered under your control this turn, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Wandering Yordle
card.text: Whenever Wandering Yordle attacks, up to one target creature you don't control traverses. (Exile it until its owner's next combat phase. They may have it enter tapped and attacking.)

card.name: Subterranean Collapse
card.text: Subterranean Collapse deals X damage to each creature. Until end of turn, whenever a creature dealt damage this way dies, uncover. (Create a Treasure token or you may put Relic card you own from outside the game into your graveyard.)

card.name: An Explorer's Journey
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value. You may play cards exiled this way until end of turn. At the beginning of your next end step, An Explorer's Journey deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards still exiled this way.

card.name: Taliyah, the Stoneweaver
card.text: Once each turn, whenever a Desert card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to the battlefield tapped. {3}{G}{G}: Put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. card.name: Radiance of the Ascended

card.name: Into the Rift
card.text: Exile the top eight cards of your library. An opponent puts three time counters on a nonland card exiled this way, then two on another nonland, and then one on another nonland. card.name: Sandstone Sentinel
card.text: When Sandstone Sentinel enters, mill three cards. {1}{V}, Exile Sandstone Sentinel from your graveyard: Return up to three land cards from your graveyard to your hand. (Spend only mana produced by effects that add mana of any color to pay {V}.)

card.name: K'Sante, Pride of Nazumah
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample Whenever K'Sante attacks, you may tap him. If you do, prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to other creatures you control.

card.name: Malzahar, Prophet
card.text: Mobilize 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, create two tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.) Whenever Malzahar, Prophet attacks, you may sacrifice any number of other creatures. When you do, return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to the total power of creatures sacrificed this way from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Vekauran Vagabond
card.text: Haste Whenever Vekauran Vagabond attacks, uncover. (Create a Treasure token or you may put Relic card you own from outside the game into your graveyard.) If you would uncover, instead create a Treasure token and you may put a Relic card you own from outside the game into your graveyard.

card.name: Nashramae Delegate
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) If you would create one or more tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional 1/1 red Warrior creature token. If you have the city's blessing, instead those tokens plus that many 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens are created.

card.name: Reconstructor of History
card.text: Menace When Reconstructor of History enters, return up to one target artifact card, up to one target enchantment card, up to one target instant card, up to one target sorcery card, and up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rammus the Armordillo
card.text: Trample Whenever Rammus enters or attacks, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you returned a nontoken card to your hand, uncover. (Create a Treasure token or you may put Relic card you own from outside the game into your graveyard.)

card.name: Hive Herald
card.text: Flash Flying When Hive Herald enters, if you cast it, exile all nonland permanents target player controls. Return those cards to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Bel'Veth, Empress of the Void
card.text: Flying Ward—Discard a card. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice each other nonland nontoken permanent you control. Draw a card for each permanent sacrificed this way.

card.name: Sivir, Battle Mistress
card.text: First strike Whenever you cast a spell, create a tapped Treasure token. At the beginning of your end step, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield if its mana value is equal to or less than the number of artifacts you've sacrificed this turn.

card.name: Rek'Sai, the Terror Beneath
card.text: Creatures you control that have entered this turn get +1/+1 and have hexproof. At the beginning of your end step, you may have Rek'Sai traverse. (Exile it until its owner's next combat phase. They may have it enter tapped and attacking.)

card.name: Xer'Sai Burrows
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}. {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Create a 2/2 black Horror creature token. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Sunken Capital
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. {2}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Sunken Capital deals 2 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Akshan, the Rogue Sentinel
card.text: First strike Whenever another creature you control dies, exile it with an atonement counter on it. Once each turn, when a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may cast a card you own exiled with an atonement counter on it. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: The Sun Disc
card.text: Whenever you tap a permanent for mana, add one mana of any type that permanent produced. At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {8}. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters and an indestructible creature on target creature you control. It becomes an Avatar.

card.name: Protector of the Oasis
card.text: Reach You may play lands from your graveyard. When Protector of the Oasis enters, mill three cards. When Protector of the Oasis dies, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Icathian Mirage
card.text: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Icathian Mirage enters, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment. Sacrifice Icathian Mirage at the beginning of your next end step unless it was kicked.

card.name: Decode Thoughts
card.text: Counter target spell. Each player mills four cards.

card.name: Pluck the Soul
card.text: Choose one – • Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature, enchantment, or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card. • Target opponent sacrifices a battle or enchantment.

card.name: Belligerent Ralsiji
card.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Haste When Belligerent Ralsiji enters, sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step unless it was kicked.

card.name: Hibernating Rockbear
card.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) When Hibernating Rockbear enters, search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Sacrifice Hibernating Rockbear at the beginning of your next end step unless it was kicked.

card.name: Clockling SHU
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: End the turn. Activate only during your turn and if an opponent doesn't control a spell or ability.

card.name: Abandoned Chronarium
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Create a Clockling token. (It's a 1/1 Construct artifact creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: End the turn. Activate only during your turn and if an opponent doesn't control a spell or ability.")

card.name: Nashramae, Crossroads of Wonder
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {4}{G}{U}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Activate only if you have the city's blessing and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Nazumeh, Haven of Hunters
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains your choice of lifelink, vigilance, or trample until end of turn. Activate only if you have the city's blessing and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Xolan, Ruins of the Faceless
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {R}{W}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Zuretta, Risen City
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {B}{G}, {T}: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Bel'Zhun, Noxian Outpost
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Tomb of the Ascended
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {W}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: You may cast target creature card from your graveyard. It enters with a finality counter. Activate only if you have the city's blessing and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Marrowmark, Ribcage Market
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {X}{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. Activate only if you have the city's blessing and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Vekaura, on Bloodied Coin
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {1}{B}{R}, {T}: Draw a card unless an opponent has Vekaura deal 3 damage to them. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Nerimazeth, Ruins of Power
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {2}{U}{B}, {T}: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Tower Removed From Time
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {W}{U}, {T}: Exile target permanent you control, then return to the battlefield. Activate only if you have the city's blessing and only during your turn.

card.name: The Great Sai
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Lamppost SHU
card.text: Equipped creature gains the activated and triggered abilities of cards you own with memory counters on them. Equip {2}

card.name: Clue SHU
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Horror Pest SHU
card.text: Mobilize 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Warrior creature token. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Treasure SHU
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Shard of Violence
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, Shard of Violence deals 1 damage to any target. If you control five or more legendary Shards, it deals 5 damage to any target instead. {2}{R}, Sacrifice Shard of Violence: Scry 1, then draw a card. Shard of Violence deals 3 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Emperor's Judgment
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Destroy all creatures. If you have the city's blessing, return a creature card put into your graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Screaming Acolytes
card.text: When Screaming Acolytes enters, search your library for a legendary creature card, exile it with a number of note counters on it equal to its mana value, then shuffle. For as long as it remains exiled it gains "Whenever you cast a spell, remove a note counter from this card. If you can't, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It enters tapped."

card.name: Hierophant of Zuretta
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As long as you have the city's blessing, Hierophant of Zuretta gets +2/+3 and has "Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, discard a card."

card.name: One Mind to Many
card.text: Create X tokens that are copies of target creature, except they have haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice them. Then gain control of that creature until end of turn and untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Petrifying Baccai
card.text: This spell can't be countered Deathtouch Whenever Petrifying Baccai becomes the target of a spell or ability you don't control, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Repurposed Automaton
card.text: Whenever a token enters, exile it unless its controller pays {1}.
